text: Need Matthew Taylor for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $5,110, looking for 2 x TikTok video, 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 2 x Instagram reel, 2 x LinkedIn post. 9 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
